questions.question: Who is the name of the protagonist in the film?
Who does Melanie claim to visit in Bodega Bay?
How is Melanie similar to Annie?

choices.answer: Both abandon the children to the bird attacks
Both are originally from Bodega Bay

questions.question: What is the purpose of the love relationship in the film?

choices.answer: It shows that pets can substitute for real relationships
It shows that romance is very important
It engages the audience with the characters

questions.question: How does Melanie change over the course of the film?

choices.answer: She is revealed to be a CIA agent
She is revealed to be a pigeon carrier

questions.question: How does the actions of the birds in the film suggest about nature?

choices.answer: Birds make electronic beeps when they attack
Darwin was correct about the survival of the fittest
Animals can be mysterious and random
Their actions can be predicted & understood through science

questions.question: When does Melanie effectively cease being a character in the film?

choices.answer: When she arrives at Bodega Bay
When she decides to become a bird and attack Mitch
After she is attacked by birds in the playground
After she is attacked by birds in the attic

questions.question: Why are the birds in the film so violent?

choices.answer: Scientists have determined that birds secretly hate people
There is no explanation for the violence
They are punishing Melanie for disrespecting the lovebirds
The birds ate toxic shellfish and became crazy
